title: Maestro error
body: Every time that I complete a game whether its a win or loss my game shows a maestro error requiring me to restart my client. I know that it isnt a big problem but after a million times of doing so this is getting irritating.

replies.body:
Hi,

What is the error message it shows? And have you tried anything to try and fix it?  eg. [Repairing](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) the client?

Cheers
Mindstar

Hey, the message it shows is 'There was an error connecting with the Maestro. League of Legends will now exit. Please try restarting the client.'
I've tried repairing the client, moving the location of the folder into a different location and tried running it through administrator but nothing fixed my problem.

Edit: Maybe I should also mention that when this started happening I also have been getting random ping spikes only momentarily throughout my games.
